title: PPB - Online Services Portal
text: INSTRUCTIONS FOR APPLICATION OF A NEW PREMISE LICENSE When applying for a New premise license: - Log into the PPB’s practice portal through practice.pharmacyboardkenya.org - Sign in using your registration or enrollment number and password - Once logged in, click on New Facility on the dashboard then fill in the details of the New premise, attach E-citizen name search of the business and current medical council license if it is a hospital - Submit the application and wait for communication of review process from the Board. - If approved, follow the instructions and complete the application as per the premise type applied for and submit for payment - Once on the payment page, follow the instructions on payment and download your receipt after successful submission of payment - If approved, the Regional PPB office will contact the applicant for inspection of the premise - Final review process will happen after the inspection. - 0nce approved, the applicant should download and print the license for purposes of conspicuously displaying in the premises INSTRUCTIONS FOR RENEWAL OF A PREMISE LICENSE AS A SUPERINTENDENT When applying for a license as a superintendent: - Log into the PPB’s practice portal through practice.pharmacyboardkenya.org - Sign in using your registration or enrollment number and password - Once logged in, click on “Renewal” on the dashboard then “New renewal application” - Write the name of the premise and wait for a drop-down list to appear from the database and choose the premise from the list - Choose “YES” for superintendent - If the premise type is Retail or Wholesale, add the name of the director at the bottom and submit - If the premise is a Hospital, attach the current year’s medical council license, add the name of the director at the bottom and submit for payment - If the premise is a Manufacturer, attach the current GMP certificate from PPB, add the name of the director at the bottom and submit for payment - Once on the payment page, follow the instructions on payment and download your receipt and wait for communication from the Board on the review process. INSTRUCTIONS FOR RENEWAL OF A PRACTICE LICENSE AS A NON-SUPERINTENDENT When applying for a license as a non-superintendent: - Log into the PPB’s practice portal through practice.pharmacyboardkenya.org - Sign in using your registration or enrollment number and password - Once logged in, click on Renewal on the dashboard then New renewal application - Write the name of the premise and wait for a drop down to appear from the database and choose the premise from the list - Choose “NO” for superintendent and submit for payment - Once on the payment page, follow the instructions on payment and download your receipt and wait for communication from the Board on the review process. - Note that the superintendent has to apply first and the premise license approved before any other person can be approved INSTRUCTIONS FOR VARATION OF AN ISSUED LICENSE When applying for a variation of an issued license: - Log into the PPB’s practice portal through practice.pharmacyboardkenya.org - Sign in using your registration or enrollment number and password - Once logged in, click on Variation on the dashboard - Choose the type of variation from the drop down, write the reason(s) for variation and attach the appropriate evidence - Submit and pay if payment is required and wait for communication from the Board on the review process.
